name: AnimalWorldFacts
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal world facts
des:
Have a lot of fun and learn more and more about animals.
You will get different facts about random animals every time you ask Alexa.
As a child we all used to love animal facts, your children and you will love this app and will learn a lot at the same time.
What is the scientific name of a grey wolf?
Can you compare an elephant with a blue whale?
Is the killer whale really a whale?
A male gorilla can eat 40 pounds of food a day.
A beaver’s teeth never stop growing.
Snakes do not blink.
Sharks are immune to cancer!
Hippo’s sweat is pink.

Please leave your comment, what can we do to make this app better.
We will answer your requests.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
